Key Match Events: Eric Haase scored on a double play in the 10th inning
Devin Williams made it stand up for the win
Post-Match Reflections: The Brewers improved to 6-5 in extra-inning games
Alexis Diaz had two consecutive blown saves in his last two appearances
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trevor Megill (1-3) pitched a scoreless ninth to post the win
Willie Adames homered off Nick Martinez leading off the second inning for the Brewers
William Contreras hit his 19th home run in the fourth
Santiago Espinal hit his ninth home run of the season for the Reds in the bottom of the second
Jonathan India hit his 13th home run in the fifth
Rea pitched four innings, allowing four runs, three earned, on four hits, including two solo home runs
Nick Martinez, working on three days rest, pitched 5 1/3 innings, allowing four runs on seven hits and a walk
Others: Jackson Chourio twisted his right ankle trying to beat out a ball in the shortstop hole in the fifth inning but stayed in the game
Brewers' Wade Miley began throwing. He is seeing Dr. Timothy Kremchek in Cincinnati to assess his progress
Reds' Hunter Greene has reduced pain from the contusion on his right elbow and began throwing
